title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 95.9 - Noxious weed seeds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 95.9 - Noxious weed seeds

State Regulations

The term noxious weed seeds includes, in addition to those
seeds set forth in definition 7 of section
136
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, the seeds of the following: Leafy spurge (Euphorbia esula)

Annual bluegrass (Poa annua) when present in lawn seed or
lawn-seeding mixtures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
95.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
